com.netflix.genie.web.jpa.services

Class JpaCommandPersistenceServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.jpa.services.JpaCommandPersistenceServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandPersistenceService

    @Transactional(rollbackFor={GenieException.class,GenieRuntimeException.class,javax.validation.ConstraintViolationException.class})
public class JpaCommandPersistenceServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommandPersistenceService
    Implementation of the CommandPersistenceService interface.
    Since:
    2.0.0

        user - The name of the user who created the configuration
        statuses - The status of the applications to get. Can be null.
        tags - tags allocated to this command

        Returns:
        All the commands matching the specified criteria
